thread.section_title: PromGirl Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PromGirl | www.promgirl.com | 14 of 539
thread.title: Carol

author: Carol
title: Carol
text: I ordered a dress for my daughter and received it very quickly which was a good thing. The dress runs a little larger than the typical size 4, but I can take it in some in places. However, the dress has a horrible strong smell. I'm not sure how I'm going to get it to go away but I will be trying everything I can for you can't wear it with that smell. You would definitely stand out in a crowd, but not in a good way. Take that into consideration when purchasing this dress. You won't be able to wear it without doing what you can to make the dress smell decent.
